scripts.android:launch: cd .. && adb shell am start -n com.learnerapp/.MainActivity
scripts.android:dev: ENVFILE=.env.dev && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDevDebug && ./gradlew installDevDebug -PreactNativeDevServerPort=8081 && npm run android:launch
scripts.android:uat: ENVFILE=.env.uat && cd android && ./gradlew assembleUatDebug && ./gradlew installUatDebug -PreactNativeDevServerPort=8081 && npm run android:launch
scripts.android:prod: ENVFILE=.env.prod && cd android && ./gradlew assembleProdDebug && ./gradlew installProdDebug -PreactNativeDevServerPort=8081 && npm run android:launch
scripts.android:debug: cd android && ./gradlew clean && cd .. && react-native bundle --platform android --dev true --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug && cd ..
scripts.android:release: cd android && ./gradlew clean && cd .. && react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/build/intermediates/res/merged/release/ && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-* && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/raw/* && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease && cd ..
scripts.release_uat_release_apk: export ENVFILE=.env.uat && cd android && ./gradlew clean && cd .. && react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/build/intermediates/res/merged/release/ && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-* && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/raw/* && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease && cd ..
scripts.release_prod_release_apk: export ENVFILE=.env.prod && cd android && ./gradlew clean && cd .. && react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/build/intermediates/res/merged/release/ && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-* && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/raw/* && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease && cd ..
